attributes.action: Urge all Mobile phone providers to offer 'free calls and text messages' to military personnel when in basic training or on operational duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keeping in touch with family and friends is essential for those in the forces. Young people at basic training need the support of their families. All too often after 14 weeks training and on long tours of duty young soldiers and their families find they cannot afford to pay their phone bills. Mobile phone companies should provide 'free' unlimited calls and text to all troops when they are at basic training and on operational tours of duty.
